subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[fall down]]; to [[collapse]]
# to [[perish]]
# to [[die]]; to get [[killed]]

#* {{zh-x|到 時候 我 就 斃 了 他們|I would '''shoot''' them '''dead''' then|ref='''2001''', {{w|Chiung Yao}}, {{w|zh:情深深雨濛濛|情深深雨濛濛}} (episode 1<!--, 34:35-->, Mainland version)}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[cancel]] (a show, etc.)
